Please visit our Hours Page for detailed information. Reservations CONTACT 23 SW Osceola St Downtown Stuart, FL 772-600-5025 info@grandemartier.com HOME ABOUT HOURS EVENTS LOCATION MENU bottom of page

MENU | La Grande Martier top of page HOME ABOUT HOURS EVENTS LOCATION MENU Menu Close La Grande Martier RESERVATIONS DINNER BRUNCH KIDS HAPPY HOUR DINNER CHEF'S FEATURE Our kitchen celebrates the flavors of the Low Country with rotating chef specials—available for a limited time and crafted with seasonal ingredients. These dishes spotlight Southern classics reimagined with elegance and depth. Prime Rib Available Wednesday Only Slow-roasted to perfection and hand-carved to order, our Prime Rib is served with au jus and creamy horseradish. Accompanied by buttery mashed potatoes and asparagus. HORS D'OEUVRES Freshly Baked Baguette w/ Herbed Oil Served with Butter & Dipping Oil Infused with Garlic, Fresh Basil, Parsley & Oregano $6 Goat Cheese Croquettes Goat Cheese, Garlic Potato Mash, Scallion, Pesto, Chipotle Aioli $15 Blueberry Brie Crostini Melted Brie Topped with House-Made Blueberry-Lemon Compote & Julienne Mint $15 Roasted Garlic & Baguette Roasted Garlic, Goat Cheese, Pesto, Cherry Chipotle Jam, Freshly Baked Baguette $16 Pork Belly Grits Cakes Crispy Grits Cakes Topped with Glazed Pork Belly, Sesame & Scallions $16 Fried Green Tomato with Bacon Jam Slow-Cooked Bourbon Bacon Jam atop Cornmeal-Crusted Flash-Fried Green Tomato $16 Cherry Chipotle Baked Brie Hand-Cut Brie Wedge Paired with House-Made Cherry Chipotle Jam, Freshly Baked Baguette $17 Baked Artichoke & Spinach Dip Artichoke, Spinach, Feta, Mozzarella, Parmesan, Freshly Baked Baguette $18 Watermelon Feta Crostini Fresh Watermelon & Feta over Sliced Cucumber, Julienne Mint, Balsamic Glaze $15 Martier Escargot Cognac, Garlic Butter, Parsley, Puff Pastry $20 Caribbean Crab & Shrimp Cakes Pan-Seared Jumbo Lump Crab & Shrimp Cakes, Remoulade, Tropical Slaw $20 Crab Ravigote & Spinach Soufflé Sweet Potato Toast Points, Spinach Soufflé, Chilled Creamy French Crab Salad $20 Sesame Crusted Ahi Tuna* Ginger, Seaweed, Wasabi, Soy, Wonton Crisps $20 SOUPS & SALADS Enhancements: Chicken $10 / 4 Shrimp $14 / Salmon $17 / Steak $17 French Onion $12 Tomato Florentine $10 Caesar Salad $7 House Salad* Mixed Greens, Tomato, Onion, Cucumber, Parmesan, Croutons, Balsamic Vinaigrette $7 Steak & Arugula Salad* Sliced Prime NY Strip, Arugula, Caramelized Onion, Tomato, Radish, Blue Cheese Crumble, Balsamic Vinaigrette $26 Chicken Caesar Salad Grilled or Fried Chicken, Romaine, Parmesan, Croutons, Caesar Dressing $19 Chicken, Avocado & Brie Salad Chicken Breast, Avocado, Brie, Mixed Greens, Caramelized Onions, Tomato, Balsamic Vinaigrette $22 Citrus Scottish Salmon Greek Salad* Grilled Scottish Salmon, Romaine, Cucumber, Tomato, Red Onion, Sweet Pepper, Kalamata Olive, Pepperoncini, Feta, Greek Dressing $24 Hazelnut & Blue Cheese Wedge Romaine Wedge, Blue Cheese Crumble, Bacon, Hazelnuts, Craisins, Blue Cheese Dressing $16 CLASSICS Lamb'douille Meatloaf Blend of Lamb, Andouille Sausage & Angus Beef Topped with a Sweet & Spicy Bourbon Glaze. Served w/ Mashed Potatoes & Glazed Carrots Half $21 Full $29 100% Wagyu Gourmet Cheeseburger* Choice of Cheese (1): Cheddar, Mozz, Blue, Brie, Gruyère/Gouda Blend. Served w/Lettuce, Tomato, Onion & Pickle on a Brioche Bun w/ Fries $19 Chicken Pot Pie Pulled Chicken & Tender Vegetables in a Creamy Velouté Topped with a Golden Flaky Puff Pastry Half $21 Full $29 Chicken Française Herb-Marinated Chicken Breast 
Dredged in Seasoned Parmesan Egg Batter, 
Sautéed with Lemon, Butter & White Wine. 
Served on a Bed of Fettuccine $32 Seasonal Vegetable Risotto Grilled Seasonal Vegetables over Creamy 
Sweet Pea Risotto with Fresh Parmesan $28 FRESH CATCH Savannah Snapper Lightly Blackened Pan-Seared Fresh Snapper Topped with a Georgia Peach, Napa Cabbage, Carrot, Cucumber, Bell Pepper & Pickled Shallot Slaw. Served over a Flash-Fried Smoked Gouda Grits Cake w/ Grilled Asparagus Half $21 Full $35 Creole Shrimp & Gouda Grits Blackened Shrimp & Smoked Pork Belly Lardon in a Classic Creole Sauce with Sautéed Garlic, Tomato, Onion & Bell Pepper atop Creamy Smoked Gouda Grits $35 Cedar Plank Scottish Salmon* Maple Mustard-Glazed Scottish Salmon Grilled over a Cedar Plank. Served w/ Garlic Mashed Potatoes & Glazed Carrots $38 BUTCHER BLOCK New Zealand Lamb Chasseur* Dijon-Herb Crusted Grass-Fed Rack of Lamb with Classic French Mushroom Sauce, Garlic Potato & Goat Cheese Croquettes, Asparagus $48 Crisp Pork Osso Bucco Paired with Heirloom Tomato Au Jus, Garlic Mashed Potatoes & Asparagus $39 12oz Prime NY Strip* Roasted Garlic Compound Butter, Garlic Mashed Potatoes & Asparagus $39 8oz Filet Mignon Au Poivre* Grilled Center-Cut Filet Mignon with Dijon-Cognac Peppercorn Sauce, Garlic Mashed Potatoes & Asparagus $52 Burgundy-Braised Short Ribs Short Ribs Slow-Braised with Fresh Herb Mirepoix Cabernet Demi-Glace. Served w/ Garlic Mashed Potatoes & Asparagus $44 SIDES Split Entrée (Extra Accoutrements) $10 Asparagus $8 Glazed Baby Carrots $7 Garlic Mashed Potatoes $7 Fries $5 Sweet Pea Risotto with Fresh Parm $12 DESSERTS Crème Brûlée du Jour $13 Crème Brûlée $13 Candied Pecan Key Lime Pie $13 LA GRANDE MARTIER Bar Restaurant Café HOME ABOUT HOURS EVENTS LOCATION MENU Menu Close HOURS Seasonal hours vary by service. Please visit our Hours Page for detailed information. Reservations CONTACT 23 SW Osceola St Downtown Stuart, FL 772-600-5025 info@grandemartier.com HOME ABOUT HOURS EVENTS LOCATION MENU bottom of page

Osceola Street Stuart FL 34994 (772) 600-5025 Visit Website Hours: Tuesday-Wednesday 11AM-Midnight Thursday-Saturday 11AM-2AM Sunday Brunch 10AM-3PM Speakeasy 5PM-Mid Driving Directions: Historic Downtown Stuart.  Enter from Osceola St. or Seminole St. About Us European-inspired Lowcountry cuisine nestled in the historic Post Office Arcade in Downtown Stuart. Chef's delectable daily specials. Daily Brunch, Lunch & Dinner. Breezeway Live Music Bar. Authentic 1920 Speakeasy. 2 Full Cocktail Bars. Fine Wine and Beer. Skylit fountain gallery, crystal veranda, twinkling hearth room, French Terrace. Historic/Unique/Vintage Chic! Highlights Daily Brunch - $10.00 - $33.00 Lunch - $10.00 - $33 Dinner $10.00 - $66.00 Rep/Contact Info Ms. Lisa Councilman × Close Ms. Lisa Councilman Phone: (772) 600-5025 Send an Email Share × Print Email Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Pinterest Close Tell a Friend × Send Request Cancel Connect with us 1650 S Kanner Highway Stuart, FL 34994 772-287-1088 x111 info@stuartmartinchamber.org Facebook-f Twitter Youtube Linkedin-in Chamber Info Join The Chamber Member Search Member Benefits President's Report Contact The Chamber Privacy Policy News & Events Online Compass Member News Chamber Calendar Community Calendar Non-Profit Events Health Resources Newsletter Enter your email, subscribe to our newsletter and stay informed!
